sentences.sentence: Gilder is trying to make a logos argument by stating many facts and reasons, but is causing a fallacy with the information he presents.
sentences.translation: 吉尔德想要用标志参数来说明很多事实和理由，但因此也导致谬论。

sentences.sentence: Amazingly pilot Mike Newman, 35, crawled out of the wreckage of the high performance Swift S-1 gilder after the cockpit broke up on impact.
sentences.translation: 令人称奇的是35岁的飞行员麦克·纽曼在这高性能的雨燕s - 1滑翔机的驾驶舱因撞击破碎后竟然从舱里爬了出来。
